template.name: Gitlab: ID not found in title
template.t:
**WARNING**: Could not link to Odoo task or ticket. Record ID not found in the title of the MR, supported formats: ``` { record type }#{ number } ``` Available types: 'task#', 't#', 'ticket#', 'issue#', 'i#' (case insensitive)
_Examples_:
- task#123
- i#123
